English: Hi there.
Chinese: ……啊，你、你好。
Korean: ……아, 안녕하세요
German: Hallo.

English:
Fancy meeting you here.
Are you sunbathing?
Chinese:
居然在這裡見面，真是巧呢
你在做日光浴嗎？
Korean:
이런 곳에서 만나다니 이런 우연이 있군요
일광욕 중이신가요?
German:
Schön, dich hier zu treffen.
Tankst du etwas Sonne?

English:
Sorry about interrupting your work in Ikebukuro.
Are you working now? You really put in the hours.
Chinese:
在池袋真是抱歉啊，妨礙你工作……
你今天在工作嗎？　真是有精神呢
Korean:
이케부쿠로에선 실례했습니다. 일하시는 데 방해해서……
오늘은 일하시는 중인가요? 부지런하시네요
German:
Sorry, dass ich deine Arbeit gestört hatte. 
Arbeitest du gerade? Du bist ganz schön fleißig.

English:
I'm working now, too. Well, kind of.
We should both be careful not to work too hard!
Chinese:
我也是，算是在工作喔
哎呀，我們都要注意別工作得太累喔！
Korean:
저도 뭐, 일 비슷한 걸 하고 있어요
그럼 너무 열심히 일하지 않도록 서로 주의해야 되겠네요!
German:
Ich arbeite auch gerade. Na ja, gewissermaßen.
Wir sollten uns beide nicht überanstrengen!

English: How did it go?
Chinese: 喂、喂……怎麼樣了啊？
Korean: 어, 어이…… 어땠냐?
German: Wie ist es gelaufen?

English:
So it didn't react even when it saw you. It can't
be the same as the one in Ikebukuro.
Chinese:
看到你也沒有任何反應啊，
看來跟池袋的傢伙是不同人吧。
Korean:
너를 보고도 아무 반응 없었나.
아무래도 이케부쿠로 때와는 다른 사람 같군
German:
Es hat also selbst dann nicht reagiert, als es
dich gesehen hat. Es kann nicht dasselbe Ding sein
wie in Ikebukuro.

English: I think you need to try a different approach.
Chinese: 那麼……就動手試看看吧。
Korean: 그러면…… 수작을 걸어볼까
German: Ich glaube, du musst die Sache anders angehen.

English:
You're not the sharpest tool in the shed, are you?
By different approach, he means provoke it!
Chinese:
真是遲鈍的傢伙！
這時候說要動手，當然就是指要激怒他啊！
Korean:
둔한 놈이네!
수작을 건다는 건 화나게 해보겠단 소리잖아?
German:
Du bist nicht der Hellste, was?! Mit anders
angehen meint er, du sollst das Ding direkt
provozieren.

English:
You'll be fine. We'll be watching. If anything
happens, we'll be right there.
Chinese:
不用擔心，我們會好好看著的。
要是有什麼狀況，我們馬上會趕過去。
Korean:
괜찮아. 우리들이 똑똑히 지켜보고 있어.
무슨 일 있으면 바로 달려들 테니까
German:
Dir passiert schon nichts. Wir behalten dich im
Auge. Falls es Ärger geben sollte, sind wir
gleich da.

English:
Surely I've already done enough?
If anything happens, I think you'll be too late.
Chinese:
拜託你們了喔，真是的……
要是出事我想也來不及了……
Korean:
믿고 있겠습니다. 정말로……
무슨 일이 있고나선 이미 늦는다고요……
German:
Habe ich nicht schon genug getan?
Wenn es Ärger gibt, kommt ihr sicher zu spät.

English: Quit your whining and get over there!
Chinese:
少囉唆！！
不要講這些快點過去啦！
Korean:
시끄럿!!
궁시렁대지 말고 빨랑 가!
German: Hör auf zu jammern und mach dich auf die Socken!

English:
Oh, I almost forgot: don't strike the first blow.
Otherwise any arrest would be unlawful.
Chinese:
喔，我忘了說了。你可不要先出手喔？
那樣可就不能用妨礙公務來帶他回署裡了。
Korean:
아참, 말하는 걸 잊었는데 먼저 공격하면 안 된다?
정당방위가 성립하지 않게 되니까
German:
Oh, das hätte ich fast vergessen, du darfst nicht
zuerst angreifen. Sonst wäre eine Festnahme
illegal.

English:
Erm... Sorry about last time.
I think I mistook you for someone else, hehehe.
Chinese:
啊、那個……剛才真是失禮了。
我好像搞錯人了……嘿嘿嘿。
Korean:
저, 저기……아깐 실례했습니다
아무래도 사람을 착각한 모양이라……에헤헤
German:
Ähm ... Das eben tut mir leid.
Ich muss dich wohl verwechselt haben, hehehe.

English: You don't have a brother in Ikebukuro, do you?
Chinese: 難不成……你有其他兄弟在池袋嗎？
Korean: 혹시……이케부쿠로에 형제분이 계시진 않나요?
German: Du hast nicht zufällig einen Bruder in Ikebukuro?

English:
(I get the strong impression he doesn't want
people talking to him.)
Chinese:
（NAVIT身上，傳來一股好強烈，
　不要跟我說話的壓力……）
Korean:
(내빗씨로부터 엄청난
 말 걸지 마 오오라가 나오고 있다…)
German:
(Ich bekomme den starken Eindruck, dass er nicht
angesprochen werden möchte.)

English: (I guess I have no choice. It's all on me now.)
Chinese:
（……看來是叫我「動手！」的意思，
　大概不能期待他們幫忙了……）
Korean:
(……아무래도「가라!」라고 하는 듯하다.
 도움은 기대할 수 없겠군……)
German:
(Ich schätze, ich habe keine andere Wahl. Jetzt
hängt alles von mir ab.)

English: (There's no other option. Here goes nothing!)
Chinese: （沒辦法，這時候就……！）
Korean: (하는 수 없지. 여기선 일단……!)
German: (Es hilft alles nichts. Los geht’s!)

English:
Make fun of how he looks.
Do an annoying dance.
Insult him.
Chinese:
嘲笑他的外表
跳起輕視他的舞
模仿馬跟鹿
Korean:
겉모습을 바보취급 해본다
바보같은 춤을 춘다
말과 사슴 흉내를 낸다
German:
Sein Aussehen verspotten.
Nervig herumtanzen.
Ihn beleidigen.

English:
That costume looks so stupid!
Who would wear something like that?
Your smile makes me wanna punch your face!
Chinese:
嗚哇～不會吧～這人偶裝～
都是大人了還穿這種東西，真不敢相信～
還擺這種笑臉，反而更讓人不爽啊～
Korean:
우와~ 그건 아니다~ 그 인형옷~
다 큰 어른이 그런 걸 입다니 믿겨지지 않는걸~
너무 웃겨서 오히려 열 받아~
German:
Was für ein bescheuertes Kostüm!
Wer zieht denn sowas an?
Hör auf zu Grinsen oder es setzt was!

English: (How do you like my little dance?!)
Chinese: （接招吧！　看我全神貫注的舞蹈！）
Korean: (…받아라! 내 혼신의 춤!!)
German: (Wie gefällt dir mein kleiner Tanz?!)

English:
You're so stupid!
Nobody likes you!
You smell!
Chinese:
笨蛋啊、笨蛋
嘶～、嘶啊～
噗嚕嚕嚕～嚕呵僕呵
Korean:
따가닥 따가닥
히히힝~ 히힝~
푸르르르르~ 푸륵푸륵
German:
Bist du so blöd!
Niemand mag dich!
Du stinkst!

English: Hey, what's taking so long?!
Chinese: 喂，你在幹什麼啊！！
Korean: 어이, 대체 언제까지 기다리게 할 거야 이 자식아!!
German: He, was dauert denn da so lange?!

English:
You don't know what you're doing! I'll show you
how it's done!
Chinese:
你的方法太爛了啦！！
看我示範啊！！
Korean:
방식이 너무 물렁하단 말이다!!
내가 시범을 보여주지!!
German:
Du hast doch keine Ahnung! Ich werd dir zeigen,
wie das geht!

English:
What do you think you're doing?! You'll ruin
everything!
Chinese:
妳在幹什麼啊是我要說的，伊達！
妳跑出來不就白費功夫了嗎……！
Korean:
뭘 하냐는 소리는 내가 할 말이다, 다테!
네가 나서면 전부 수포가 되잖냐…!
German: Was treibst du denn da?! Du wirst alles ruinieren!

English:
We're out of options! You there, we'd like a
moment of your time--
Chinese:
啊─真是，這樣就沒辦法了！
那邊那傢伙，我有事要問──
Korean:
아~ 정말! 이러면 어쩔 수 없지!
거기 너, 잠깐 이야기를――
German:
Wir haben alles probiert! Sie da, wir möchten
kurz mit Ihnen spre...

English: Ah! We got a runner! Hey, stop right there!
Chinese:
啊啊！？　居然逃了！
你給我站住！！
Korean:
아앗!? 도망쳤다!
야, 거기 서 이 자식아!!
German: Ah! Der will sich verdrücken! He, stehen bleiben!

English: We can't let it get away!
Chinese: 我們也追上去！
Korean: 우리도 따라간다!
German: Wir dürfen ihn nicht entwischen lassen!
